content: I think that makes a lot of sense. I'll focus on completing the DataCamp course on Data Visualization with Python and then start exploring data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI. I've heard that Tableau has a free version, so I might start with that. Do you think it's a good idea to try to apply what I learn to my current project for the major bank, or should I work on some smaller personal projects first to build my skills?
